snippet: As millions of Americans file their income tax returns, their chances of getting audited by the IRS have rarely been so low....

headline.main: Turkey's Erdogan Compares German Behavior With Nazi Period
headline.print_headline: Turkey's Erdogan Compares German Behavior With Nazi Period

lead_paragraph: As millions of Americans file their income tax returns, their chances of getting audited by the IRS have rarely been so low.
